name: Favonius Sword
effect: CRIT hits have a {0}% chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every {1}s.
description: A standard-issue longsword of the Knights of Favonius. When you're armed with this agile and sharp weapon, channeling the power of the elements has never been so easy!
